title: Man on the Run (restored, colorized) (1949, film-noir, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: Man on the Run (restored, colorized) (1949, film-noir, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: Man on the Run is a 1949 British film noir directed by Lawrence Huntington and starring Derek Farr, Joan Hopkins, Edward Chapman, Kenneth More and Laurence Harvey.
